resources.string: "Welcome to the Shoe List app. This app is developed as first milestone project in the Udacity 'Developing Android Apps with Kotlin.' course" "App consists of five screens. After login you are sent to welcome screen and instruction screen. From there you can show shoe list and add new shoes into the list.\n"
On the next page you can see all the shoes in your inventory. By pressing on plus button you can add a new shoe into the inventory and it will be shown in the list.
